name: Evil Within Magic
description:
In this game you’ll fight dangerous magical monsters, explore the ruins of civilization and avenge your family.

This game made for Girls in Games jam in 48 hours 

Slayt for full story and concept: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1f9pdETCkfAe_YNMJJpsFMu7ALM5ChSrXUcB5l7z52DQ/edit?usp=sharing

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/evilwithinmagic/740312
